Plot: About the inhabitants of a small Iowa town suddenly plagued by insanity and then death after a mysterious toxin contaminates their water supply.
Title: The Crazies
Writer: Scott Kosar (screenplay), Ray Wright (screenplay), George A. Romero
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Radha Mitchell, Joe Anderson, Danielle Panabaker
tomatoConsensus: Tense, nicely shot, and uncommonly intelligent, The Crazies is a horror remake that, unusually, works.
